input.sentences: the bike race started very early in the morning with many competitors .
these two racers are very close for the lead !
this bike racer waves to all of his adoring fans .
the top racers were given awards and bouquets of flowers .
relaxing and talking with friends later in the day .
output.sentences: In the morning everyone started racing.
The two races fought for the lead and it was a close race.
After the race the winer waves to the fans.
All the top racers received flowers.
The racer had a relaxing time talking to friends.
